comments: Continued fraction expansion of (21 + 5sqrt(21))/14 (decimal expansion is given by A176106). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 08 2012If an initial 2 is prepended to this sequence, it is Sylvester's sequence (A000058) modulo 10. - _Alonso del Arte_, Mar 25 2015
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
